title: State body > Government department
description: An element of government with executive responsibilities. Terms often used to designate such a body: ministry, department, bureau or office.

title: State body > State Agency
description: A body overseeing or administering elements of public policy. State agencies may have responsiblities which are devolved from government departments or from the state's legislative body.

title: State body > Other
description: A type of state body unlike a government department or state agency.
